tokens.name: Vibetard / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:

**Parameters:**  
- **Limit:** -3% (medium volatility range)  
- **Take Profit:** +15% (medium volume range)  
- **Stop Loss:** -10% (medium volatility range)  
- **Time Frame:** 4h (average of 2h-6h)  

**Explanation:**  
- The **buy/sell ratio** of 1.3 falls within the **balanced range** (1.0-1.5), suggesting a **conservative BUY** due to strong trade flow and buying pressure.  
- **Medium volatility** (37.5% price change) dictates a **-2% to -5% limit**, with **-3%** as a midpoint.  
- **Medium volume** ($94,780) recommends a **+10% to +20% take profit**, set at **+15%**.  
- **Medium volatility** also sets the **stop loss** at **-8% to -15%**, with **-10%** as the midpoint.  
- The **time frame** balances short-term and medium-term strategies, averaging **4h**.  

**Final Answer:**  
BUY | Limit:-3% | TP:+15% | SL:-10% | Time:4h
